{{ question.texte }}

  • {{ option.texte }}
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Question } from '../models/Question'; @Component({ selector: 'app-qcm', templateUrl: './qcm.component.html', styleUrls: ['./qcm.component.css'] }) export class QCMComponent { @Input() question!: Question; toggleOption(optionId: number, event: any): void { const option = this.question.option.find(opt => opt.optionId === optionId); if (option) { option.selected = event.target.checked; } } }
